com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service

Class CategoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service.CategoryService

  • @Service
public class CategoryService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deals with operations related to news article categories.

    2020-05-11
    Author:
    Sujan Kumar Mitra

    • Method Detail

      • getArticlesFromCategory

        public java.util.List<Article> getArticlesFromCategory(Category category,
                                                       int page)
                                                throws NewsNotFoundException,
                                                       CategoryNotFoundException
        This method returns list of articles based on category and page provided
        Parameters:
        category - articles of a particular category
        page - requested page number
        Returns:
        list of articles of size pageSize
        Throws:
        NewsNotFoundException - might throw this if articles related to this category not found
        CategoryNotFoundException - will throw this if unknown category is passed
        Since:
        2020-05-11
